text:
Posting this review only after full grooming and 2 shower sessions at Pet Stop. Our groomer, Fiona did a wonderful job with my bichonpoo‚Äôs cut. She looked so good that it was worthwhile for me to drive the distance. My puppy was also happy to enter the shop. On top of the excellent craftsmanship, the shop space is kept clean and organized. Fiona might come across like she‚Äôs keeping answers short and sweet initially, but I think the animals know when they are cared for.

We will definitely continue with Fiona for her good work!
Attached is a photo of my pup 10-14 days after her grooming. ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞
Thanks to Pet Stop, my dog has become confident in swimming. Their grooming services are also value for money. Will definitely visit again!
Love their dog grooming üëçüèª been with them for years . . . Booking is easy & price is so reasonable too . Thanks groomer fiona for making my baby look so cute ü•∞

Fiona and her staff are very professional, caring and honest. They did an excellent groom for my mini poodle and he is a cute happy boy again. The cost is reasonable and location is central. Will not hesitate to recommend Pet Stop for all your grooming needs.

Thanks for helping to groom a lost and found dog at short notice. Your excellent grooming skills transformed Brownie from a shaggy dog to a cute pup instantly. For a dog who has never gone for full grooming before in his life, and also a dog which has bitten a few people who tried to help him, you treated him with compassion and care, and we could tell he was happier after the session. Thanks for alerting us to his ears and butt issue so that we could bring him to the vet timely. Brownie thanks Fiona and team and gives Pet Stop full marks 5 stars!
